summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 36E, Page 103 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone certain property in Block 1 of Sarah B. Yesler's 1st Addition to the City of Seattle, lying northwest of the intersection of East Aloha Street and Harvard Avenue East from Residential, Multi-Family, Lowrise 3 (L3) Zone to Residental Single Family 5000 (SF 500) Zone. (Petition of Peter Eglick and Mirrily Chick; C.F. NO. 292054.)
